x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Hospitals and NGOs struggle to track, maintain, and replace critical biomedical equipment such as ventilators, dialysis machines, and lab analyzers. Manual logs cause delays, compliance issues, and unexpected breakdowns, leading to higher costs and service disruptions.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: Smart Biomedical Equipment Lifecycle Management System
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A ServiceNow based asset lifecycle management system integrated with IoT and AI analytics.

  • Tracks each device from purchase to disposal.
  • Predicts maintenance needs using real-time usage data.
  • Automatically schedules preventive maintenance and notifies biomedical engineers.
  • Generates compliance and performance reports for management.

ServiceNow products/capabilities:
Asset Management, Predictive Intelligence, Workflow Automation, Performance Analytics.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

IoT device integration (sensors or smart tags), hospital ERP/EMR system APIs, and cloud data storage.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Data integration with legacy hospital systems, staff training on digital workflows, and ensuring device data security.
